line_1: And tightly garter'd on his hose;
line_2: AT earliest dawn brisk Archy rose,

line_1: Look here — I present you this wonderful hose,
line_2: Into which, ev'ry night when you bed with your spouse,

line_1: Why ev'ry devil dance in scarlet hose?
line_2: Why shou'd Pol Peachum shine in satin cloaths?

line_1: Cross-legg'd he sat, and his ungartered hose
line_2: Of each lean limb half hide, and half expose;

line_1: I'll deck out bandy-legs with gold-clock'd hose,
line_2: Sooner than thus my want of sense expose,

line_1: I'll deck out bandy-legs with gold-clock'd hose,
line_2: Or wear a toupet-wig without a nose.
